channel.title: Running Client Issue
channel.description:
Background Information ____________________ 1) Windows 7 2) 64 Bit 3) Did Environmental Variables for Java 4) Java 6 Update 24 (On My Computer) _________________________________
1) My clients blackscreen pops up and disappears. When I go to runclient:edit:the code is :
[code]@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit [/code]
[code][/code]

item.title: Running Client Issue
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

@echo off start java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

Read full topic
